p: BHK-21 (clone 13) cells (RRID: CVCL_1915) were purchased from the European Collection of Authenticated Cell Cultures (ECACC), and tested negative for mycoplasma. Cells were infected with serial dilutions of virus and incubated under an overlay consisting of Glasgow minimum essential medium (GMEM) supplemented with 2% (v/v) newborn calf serum and 0.6% Avicel (w/v) (FMC BioPolymer, Philadelphia, PA) at 37°C for 4 days. Cell monolayers were fixed with 4% (w/v) formaldehyde and plaques were visualized by Giemsa staining.
